message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this price reflects its true value and presents a great opportunity for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm looking to get the best deal possible, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value your interest, $10,500 is a bit too low for me. Would you consider $11,000? It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $10,750? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
